entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
